snippet.title: Terra Exodus Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
In the face of impossible odds, the people of Terra look to you for salvation. The Plethora onslaught is relentless, and the planet is on the brink of annihilation. Every citizen of Terra has dedicated the last 50 years to the Exodus Program, an escape plan of global proportions.  As a commander in humanity's last stand, your mission is clear: Defend the cities, manage evacuations, and lead the final resistance. Will you rise to the challenge and guide Terra through its darkest hours? 


Terra Exodus is an experimental action strategy game made by a solo developer looking to break some new ground in the genre.  Using a keyboard or controller (recommended), make fast and meaningful decisions to shore up defenses while the city is evacuated!

Check it out on Steam today!
